programme.desc: Em 2018, depois de um desastre pela mudana climtica que levou a uma nova idade do gelo, um clandesttino reduto de sobreviventes devem lutar para preservar a humanidade de uma ameaa mais selvagem do que os elementos.

programme.title: Era uma vez na China, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: No fim do sculo 19, Wong Fei-Hung enfrenta o saque estrangeiro na China. Com a violncia crescendo, at tia Yee questiona os ideais ocidentais diante do poder do Kung Fu.

programme.title: Conspirao Fatal, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Depois de ser preso e ter sua reputao na Fora Area manchada, um piloto veterano foge da cadeia e parte em busca do verdadeiro criminoso. Ele, ento, descobre uma conspirao terrorista em andamento e somente ele poder evitar um desastre.

programme.title: Cidade do dio, (1997, Thriller)
programme.desc: Roy um ladro aposentado que se une ao seu irmo e dois cmplices para um ltimo trabalho, assaltar uma joalheria. O assalto d certo, mas ele trado por um dos bandidos, que mata seu irmo. Roy agora quer se vingar do antigo comparsa.

programme.title: O Justiceiro, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial problemtico disfarado deve se infiltrar em uma gangue implacvel. Mas as coisas azedam quando outro policial revela seu disfarce e ele rapidamente se v lutando por sua vida e pela vida de sua famlia.

programme.title: Police Story: A Guerra das Drogas, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: Ka Kui (Jackie Chan) prende um chefe do crime, mas a secretria o trai para libert-lo. Alm disso, ele lida com a namorada ciumenta.

programme.title: Timecop: O Guardio do Tempo, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Max Walker, um oficial de uma agncia de segurana que regula as viagens no tempo, deve lutar por sua vida contra um poltico sombrio que pretende mudar o passado para controlar o futuro.

programme.title: A Fuga, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Para sair da priso, um criminoso pede a esposa para negociar sua liberdade com um chefe da mfia. Mas quando o plano d errado, o casal tenta fugir para o Mxico.

programme.title: Beowulf: O Guerreiro das Sombras, (1999, Adventure)
programme.desc: Numa terra sob cerco, Beowulf deve combater a horrvel criatura Grendel e a sua me que procura vingana.

programme.title: Era uma vez na China 2, (1992, Action)
programme.desc: Na sequncia do clssico, Wong Fei-Hung enfrenta a seita White Lotus e protege o Dr. Sun Yat Sen, usando o Kung Fu para defender os inocentes na China em crise.

programme.title: Lute Por Sua Vida, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: Um filme focado em um grupo de pessoas obcecadas por um livro de autoajuda. medida que o livro se torna mais popular, ele afeta uma estranha variedade de personagens. Suas vidas se cruzam, gerando mudanas que duraro para sempre.

programme.title: Em Busca de um Milagre, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: O mundo do doutor Luke Matthew desaba quando ele perde o amor de sua vida e se torna pai na mesma noite. Quando ele contrata Sage como a nova bab, os dois comeam a perceber que a melhor forma de remdio deixar ir.

programme.title: Davi e Golias, (2020, Adventure)
programme.desc: No cruzamento de dois grandes imprios, um simples pastor chamado David se transforma em um poderoso guerreiro e enfrenta um gigante aterrorizante. Uma das batalhas mais lendrias da histria recontada em um conto de coragem e f.

programme.title: Atormentado pelo passado, (2020, Faith & Spirituality)
programme.desc: Um homem luta para chegar a um acordo com a insegurana paralisante e os resduos de seu abuso sexual na infncia nas mos de um padre confivel e respeitado.

programme.title: O Chamado de Deus, (2015, Drama)
programme.desc: Uma jovem problemtica que trabalha em um call center de oraes faz a diferena na vida de outras pessoas, o que a faz lidar com seu passado conturbado quando finalmente um dia percebe a f.

programme.title: A rvore Da Vida, (2011, Drama)
programme.desc: A histria de uma famlia em Waco, Texas, em 1956. O filho mais velho testemunha a perda da inocncia e luta com os ensinamentos conflitantes de seus pais.

programme.title: O Melhor Ladro do Mundo, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: Depois que o marido tem um derrame, Sue Zaidman passa a ser a nica provedora de sua famlia. Ela enfrenta uma fase difcil e turbulenta, e tem que se impor para lidar com os filhos e manter-se firme apesar das adversidades.

programme.title: Prisioneiras Nunca Mais, (2021, Thriller)
programme.desc: Inspirada em acontecimentos reais, Prisioneiras Nunca Mais conta a histria de Aggie, em busca de suas duas afilhadas, sequestradas pelo pai para serem vendidas como escravas. O filme um drama sobre a realidade do trfico humano.

programme.title: Betty e Coretta, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: Estrelando Mary J. Blige e Angela Bassett. Coretta Scott King e a Dra. Betty Shabazz, esposas do Dr. Martin Luther King e de Malcolm X, devem continuar suas vidas como mes solteiras aps o assassinato de seus maridos.

programme.title: Diante de Touha, surge um novo inimigo e seu nome, estranhamente, Jiraiya. Qual a verdadeira identidade dele? Qual o segredo escondido por trs disso? Vestindo a Jiraiya Suit ele avana sobre o indefeso Touha. Touha ter chance de venc-lo?

programme.title: Para te Ver Melhor, (1970, Entertainment)

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Orochimaru Versus Jinchuriki
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi encontra Itachi Uchiha, de quem sofrera uma amarga derrota no passado. Guy e sua equipe comeam a lutar contra um amargo rival, Kisame, que lana um poderoso chakra para subjugar o ninja da folha. Seu jutsu aprisiona Neji, Lee e Tenten.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Lgrimas De Sakura
programme.desc: Guy se arrepende ao ver seus trs alunos presos. Determinado a parar Kisame, Guy o desafia usando o nunchaku. Sem oxignio, Tenten vai ficando fraca, e Guy se prepara para usar um jutsu secreto e proibido. Naruto cai no genjutsu de Itachi.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Segredo Da Batalha
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo e Sakura salvam Naruto do genjutsu de Itachi. Kakashi comea um contra-ataque e exibe toda sua destreza. Guy enfrenta dificuldades contra Kisame, mas o derrota com um poderoso jutsu. Os ninjas da folha conseguem derrotar seu arquiminigo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Consequncias Da Traio
programme.desc: Kisame e Itachi parecem ter sido clones cujos poderes foram copiados por um jutsu de personificao. Vov Chiyo explica a conexo entre a besta de cauda e o jinchuriki. Sakura percebe que Naruto enfrenta o mesmo destino e lgrimas escorrem em seu rosto.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Pgina Inacabada
programme.desc: As equipes Kakashi e Guy fazem uma pausa. Quando a perseguio recomea, Kakashi explica a Chiyo que Naruto tambm um jinchuriki. Chiyo lamenta ter sido ela que selou o shukaku dentro de Gaara... Gaara engolfado por uma luz branca.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Infiltrao: O Covil Da Cobra!
programme.desc: As equipes Kakashi e Guy chegam ao esconderijo dos akatsuki, mas so parados por uma barreira de cinco selos. Neji usa seu byakugan para localizar os selos e os ninjas destroem a barreira. Naruto tem uma viso chocante. A equipe Guy encara uma armadilha.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Laos
programme.desc: Quebrar a barreira de cinco selos ativa uma armadilha, e a equipe Guy enfrenta cpias idnticas de si mesmos. Deidara e Sasori lutam para se apoderar do jinchuriki. Forado a seguir Naruto, Kakashi pede que vov Chiyo e Sakura no faam nada precipitado.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Algo Importante...
programme.desc: A luta entre av e neto comea. Para derrotar o verdadeiro Sasori dentro do boneco, Hiruko deve ser destrudo primeiro. S a prpria av consegue entender as armadilhas complexas de Sasori, mas Sakura que deve dar o golpe final. Que estratgia usaro?

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Histria Do lbum Ilustrado
programme.desc: Chiyo e Sakura expem Sasori, que no envelheceu nada nos ltimos vinte anos. Chiyo fica mais chocada com o segundo boneco que Sasori revela. Sasori foi quem planejou o desaparecimento do kazecage. Uma equipe ninja se dirige a um certo local.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Reencontro
programme.desc: Sakura fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno e usa um papel bomba para se livrar da fumaa. Ela tenta capturar Sasori para for-lo a dar informaes sobre Orochimaru, invocando dois bonecos para esta batalha. Naruto e Kakashi ainda perseguem Deidara!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Poder De Uchiha
programme.desc: Os bonecos criados de humanos podem comandar o jutsu que o humano usava enquanto vivo. Assim, o boneco do terceiro kazekage converte chakras em poderes magnticos. Chiyo e Sakura se protegem, Sasori faz um ataque implacvel. Sakura toma uma deciso.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ttulo
programme.desc: Sakura revida o ataque da areia de ferro. Ela rapidamente comea a ler os padres de ataque do Sasori, que se prepara para usar seu chakra. O ataque da areia de ferro penetra o espao, Sakura atingida na mo e infectada pelo veneno!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pesadelo
programme.desc: Sakura destri o boneco do terceiro kazekage graas a um antdoto que ela tomou e que funciona durante cerca de trs minutos. Chiyo e Sakura decidem derrotar Sasori nesse prazo. Sasori usa seu ltimo trunfo. Naruto e Kakashi planejam capturar Deidara.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Vento
programme.desc: Sakura e Vov Chiyo derrotam Sasori, mas ele acaba revivendo. Chiyo invoca bonecos com a tcnica do ataque branco secreto, e Sasori aplica seu ataque vermelho secreto. O antdoto de Sakura perde efeito, mas ela e Chiyo iniciam uma decisiva batalha final!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contoro
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo usa o ltimo antdoto em Sakura. Sasori tenta pr fim vida de Vov Chiyo, mas ela revida e o derrota. Sakura atingida em um lugar vital, e a nica coisa que pode salv-la um jutsu que a Vov Chiyo criou uma vez para Sasori.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Despertar Do Sono Eterno
programme.desc: Os ninjas da equipe Guy se preocupam com o resultado da luta de Sakura e Vov Chiyo enquanto enfrentam suas cpias, que permanecem firmes! Naruto segue Deidara, que se apoderou de Gaara. A preparao para a nova tcnica de Kakashi est em andamento!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Solido
programme.desc: Sakura corre para achar Naruto com Vov Chiyo, sofrendo envenenada. Kakashi revela seu mangekyo sharingan, um poderoso jutsu que transporta tudo o que o olho pode ver para outra dimenso. Naruto finalmente consegue salvar Gaara, mas fica enfurecido ...

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Inimigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde o controle e o esprito da Raposa de Nove Caudas assume o comando. Kakashi consegue suprimir a Raposa de Nove Caudas. Deidara descobre a derrota de Sasori. A equipe Guy cerca Deidara, que tenta se explodir junto com os ninjas da folha!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Impermanncia
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo realiza o jutsu de ressuscitao em Gaara. Gaara acorda cercado por Naruto e os outros e tambm por uma multido de ninjas da areia. Percebendo a verdade por trs do jutsu de ressuscitao, todos demonstram seu respeito por Chiyo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contato
programme.desc: Gaara e seus salvadores retornam Aldeia de Areia. Aps visitar o tmulo de Vov Chiyo, Naruto e os ninjas da Folha tm que partir. Deidara aparece ferido na frente de Zetsu e Tobi. Na Aldeia da Folha, algum tenta infiltrar um garoto na equipe Kakashi!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Companheiro De Equipe!
programme.desc: Kakashi hospitalizado devido tenso causada por seu mangekyo sharinga. Apesar dos apelos de Shizune para enviar outra equipe, Tsunade afirma que enviar a equipe Kakashi para fazer o trabalho.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Os Dois Reis
programme.desc: Sai diz que ele e Naruto se encontraro de novo e desaparece. Homura e Koharu dizem a Tsunade que Naruto no deve ser enviado em misses envolvendo a Akatsuki. Tsunade no concorda, ento eles exigem que ela adicione um ninja recomendado por Danzo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Sinal De Fogo Preto
programme.desc: Naruto fica enfurecido ao saber que Sai o atacou para test-lo. Tsunade, Jiraiya, Yamatoe e Shizune se reunem no quarto de Kakashi. Jiraiya expe o comportamento despreocupado de Naruto. Sai recebe um envelope misterioso do setor operacional da fundao.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Presa Na Escurido
programme.desc: A nova equipe Kakashi segue em direo ponte Tenchi. Quando Sai mostra seu desprezo por Sasuke, o antagonismo com Naruto aumenta. Yamato decide que eles passaro a noite em uma pousada para tentar melhorar as relaes entre os membros de sua equipe.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Almas Ressuscitadas
programme.desc: Sakura v Sai trabalhando em uma pintura abstrata e encontra um livro de desenhos incomum no meio das coisas dele. Enquanto vo em direo ponte Tenchi, eles se mantm atentos contra qualquer emboscada. Yamato orienta sua equipe caso uma luta acontea.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden
programme.desc: Yamato faz uma simulao para avaliar as habilidades e tcnicas de luta da equipe Kakashi. Sai abandona Naruto para concluir a misso simulada. Naruto fica uma fera e declara que, se para ajudar a salvar o Sasuke, ele ficar na mesma equipe que Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Momento De Despertar
programme.desc: O dia para capturar o espio finalmente chega. Yamato assume a aparncia de Sasori e espera que o espio aparea. Para a surpresa de todos, o espio era Kabuto. De repente, Orochimaru aparece. A situao muda, e a equipe Kakashi se encontra em risco.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Desespero
programme.desc: Ao enfrentar Orochimaru, Naruto liberta o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Quando Yamato v a quarta cauda, lembra do que Jiraiya falou. Yamato deveria suprimir o chakra que afetaria o corpo de Naruto. O ninjutsu secreto de Yamato se torna aparente.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ressonncia
programme.desc: Quando a terceira cauda aparece, Naruto s consegue ver Orochimaru. Ele est cego at para seus companheiros de equipe. Sakura atingida e cai inconsciente. Sai finalmente segue para sua misso secreta. Naruto libera a quarta cauda proibida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Meu Amigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde a conscincia e tomado por impulsos destrutivos. Os clones de Sai e Yamato testemunham uma batalha horrvel entre Orochimaru e Naruto. O poder e a aparncia de Naruto se tornam demonacos, como se ele estivesse se transformando na Raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Ameaa Se Aproxima
programme.desc: Naruto, mesmo transformado, no desiste de trazer Sasuke para casa. Sakura ferida por Naruto, mas consegue usar seu ninjutsu para conter a agitao da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Orochimaru tenta deixar o campo de batalha, mas confrontado por Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Invaso Da Akatsuki
programme.desc: Orochimaru aceita levar Sai para o esconderijo. Yamato consegue parar a agitao de Naruto, mas os ferimentos de Naruto so graves. Quando ele volta a si, Yamato revela a ele e Sakura que Sai foi embora e que Danzo pode estar conspirando algo terrvel.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sob O Cu Estrelado
programme.desc: Naruto e sakura ficam chocados quando descobrem que Danzo planeja trabalhar com Orochimaru. A equipe Dakashi forada a fazer uma pausa. Orochimaru percebe que est sendo seguido pelo clone de Yamato e decide usar Sai para despistar seus perseguidores.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Orao Do Velho Monge
programme.desc: Naruto fica chocado ao saber que foi o responsvel pelos ferimentos de Sakura. Yamato diz que ele ir suprimir o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas com seu ninjutsu. Sakura pergunta sobre uma histria estranha que ela viu no livro de desenhos de Sai.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: A Equipe 7 recebe a misso de capturar uma gangue de ladres que vem atacando o Trem Trovo e cujo esconderijo fica em uma cidade na fronteira do Pas do Fogo.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: A Equipe 7 entra na mina em que os ladres estavam se escondendo e atacada por um estranho, porm poderoso Zetsu Branco.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: A Prova Chunin est bem prximo e todos esto animados, exceto por Boruto, que deixa todo mundo para baixo.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Sem conseguir segurar a raiva que tem do pai por estragar o aniversrio da Himawari e o seu prprio, Boruto corre para confrontar Naruto.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto consegue aperfeioar seu Rasengan e comea a treinar sob a tutela de Sasuke.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: O clima acaba esquentando quando os participantes, que se preparam para a primeira etapa da Prova Chunin, tentam estimar o poder uns dos outros!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: A terceira etapa da prova comea. Nela, os participantes lutam em batalhas individuais no estilo torneio.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Diante de um adversrio que parece incrivelmente calmo e ameaador, Cho-Cho mostra uma seriedade raramente vista enquanto os companheiros de equipe torcem por ela.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: A prova chega etapa final, com o incio dos confrontos de Sarada contra Araya, da Aldeia da Areia, e Mitsuki contra Shinki, tambm da Areia!
programme.sub-title: Aldeia da folha vs Aldeia da areia

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: A batalha final do torneio comea com Boruto, Sarada e Shinki participando de uma disputa no estilo mata-mata.
programme.sub-title: O Usurio da Aldeia de Ferro: Shinki

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Momoshiki, Kinshiki e Urashiki, todos do Cl Otsutsuki, aparecem de repente na arena lotada de espectadores, e Boruto v de perto a extenso do poder de combate do pai.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto percebe o tamanho do amor de seu pai pela aldeia e as pessoas, o que tambm acaba sendo sua fraqueza.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Sasuke e os Kages travam uma batalha intensa contra Momoshiki e Kinshiki do Cl Otsutsuki que so ridiculamente poderosos.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Com Boruto assistindo tudo atentamente, Naruto e Sasuke iniciam uma batalha contra o poderoso Momoshiki!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto j pediu desculpas a todos pelos erros cometidos durante a prova, mas continua preocupado com a profecia de Momoshiki.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Os famosos atores Tomaru e Ashina recebem ameaas de morte de uma pessoa desconhecida. Agora cabe s Equipes 7 e 10 os protegerem em uma misso em conjunto.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: O flerte de Tomaru deixa Cho-Cho nas nuvens, o que faz Sarada e os outros se perguntarem se a apaixonada Cho-Cho no perdeu o foco na misso!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: O ninja com mscara de gs aparece novamente durante as filmagens e sequestra Tomaru.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Rock Lee, pai de Metal, anuncia que ele ensinar a Metal a tcnica suprema de taijutsu, Os Oito Portais Internos.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Aps o ataque do Cl Otsutsuki, o Encontro dos Cinco Kages acontece na Aldeia da Folha. Os Kages atuais e seus predecessores se renem, exceto por Ohnoki, o Terceiro Tsuchikage.
programme.sub-title: A pedra mais dura do mundo

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Os ninjas encarregados de guardar o Porto da Aldeia da Folha so atacados, e Mitsuki desaparece.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: A aldeia descobre que Boruto e Sarada saram em busca de Mitsuki. Ento a Equipe 10, de Shikadai, recebe a misso de rastre-los e traz-los de volta.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Orochimaru fala para Boruto e Sakura sobre o Sbio da Cobra Branca que vive na Caverna Ryuchi. No caminho, os dois so confrontados pela Equipe 10.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: O Sbio da Cobra Branca pede que Boruto traga para ele uma "Escama Invertida" de Garaga, uma cobra problemtica.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e companhia trabalham juntos para conseguir a Escama Invertida de Garaga, mas a batalha se mostra difcil, uma vez que Garaga tem o poder de sentir a localizao dos inimigos e transform-los em pedra.
programme.sub-title: Um inimigo feroz: O ataque cruel de Garaga!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.desc: A man named Yoshikage Kira is enjoying his lunch break at the park with a sandwich in hand. But his peaceful afternoon is cut short when Shigechi accidentally takes Kiras sandwich bag, believing it to be his own.
programme.sub-title: Yoshikage Kira Just Wants to Live Quietly, Part 1

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Yoshikage Kira Just Wants to Live Quietly, Part 2
programme.desc: Yoshikage Kira is revealed to be the serial killer whos been lurking in Morioh, and a Stand user as well. Having discovered his secret, Shigechi tries to fight off Kira with his Harvest, only to suffer fatal wounds from the killers Stand, Deadly Queen
programme.sub-title: Yoshikage Kira Just Wants to Live Quietly, Part 2

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Heart Attack, Part 1
programme.desc: Jotaro and Koichi come under the attack of Yoshikage Kiras Stand bomb, called Heart Attack. Narrowly escaping the blast, Koichi tries to go after the serial killer but is stopped by Jotaro, who tells him to focus on dealing with the Stand bomb first.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Heart Attack, Part 2
programme.desc: Kira is forced to appear before Koichi after his remote Heart Attack bomb is made useless by the boys new Stand, Reverb Act 3. Finally coming face-to-face with the serial killer, Koichi attacks him with Act 3.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Welfin, a wolf-like Chimera Ant, has realized that someone has infiltrated the palace. With his sharp sense of smell, he tracks down the intruders.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The battle between the humans and Chimera Ants is about to begin.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Zeno and Netero's sudden attack throws the palace into confusion. Concerned for the King's safety, Pitou and Pouf hurry to the King's side.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Youpi transforms and splits up the group with his attack. Morel lets Shoot and Knuckle handle things while he heads for the King.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The King faces off against Netero and Zeno.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Knuckle suddenly appears before Youpi to fight him head on.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Zeno's cryptic words to Killua and Gon becomes clear when they reach the tower.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Feeling the need to lay a punch on Youpi to avenge his friend Shoot, Knuckle decides to take on Youpi once more.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Ikalgo reads Palm's hidden message, which says that she has gone to the palace and to assume that she is dead if she does not respond before the start of the mission.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Youpi is impressed by the extermination team's abilities and acknowledges their strength.

programme.title: Death Note: Decision
programme.desc: Misa is in confinement, though her memories of the Death Note have been completely wiped away.

programme.title: Death Note: Execution
programme.desc: After fifty days of confinement the killings continue, and Misa and Light are released.

programme.title: Death Note: Ally
programme.desc: Though L is still suspicious, Light and Misa, their memories of being Kira wiped clean, return to headquarters.

programme.title: Death Note: Matsuda
programme.desc: Matsuda, the task force member assigned to watch Misa, is eager to distinguish himself.

programme.title: Death Note: Makeshift
programme.desc: L's team discovers that the Yotsuba Group meet in secret to discuss the elimination of individuals who are troublesome to their company.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Silver Chariot
programme.desc: Jotaro and his comrades are attacked by Polnareff, an assassin with a Stand called "Silver Chariot" that is capable of lightning-fast swordplay. It falls to Avdol to face down the threat using "Magician's Red."

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Dark Blue Moon
programme.desc: Jotaro welcomes a new member to the team and the group leaves for Singapore by ship. Along the way, a young stowaway is found and Jotaro comes under attack, but is the child the source of this latest evil?

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Strength
programme.desc: Jotaros group is rescued when they spot a giant cargo ship, but they soon find that the only occupant is a strange orangutan. Curious, they begin to explore the ship and solve its mysteries.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Jotaro and his companions finally make it to a hotel in Singapore, but soon Polnareff falls into a trap set by a dangerous and brutal enemy.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Yellow Temperance
programme.desc: Joseph uses his Stand to generate a spirit message from a TV, only to receive a warning claiming that Kakyoin is a traitor. Meanwhile, Jotaro, Ann and Kakyoin are out exploring Singapore when Kakyoin begins acting strangely.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: The Joestars' group arrives in India, where Polnareff is attacked by a Stand only visible through a mirror. As terrifying as it is, the Stand could also be related to his sister's murder.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Emperor and the Hanged Man Part 2
programme.desc: When Avdol is struck down defending Polnareff, the Frenchman goes into a state of shock, leaving him vulnerable. That is when "Hanged Man," Centerfold's Stand, begins its most furious attack.
programme.sub-title: The Emperor and the Hanged Man Part 2

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Empress
programme.desc: Jotaro and the others next head toward Varanasi. On their way there, Joseph realizes his arm is quite swollen. At first, it doesn't bother him much, but the bigger it gets, the creepier it looks.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Wheel of Fortune
programme.desc: Jotaro and his group head toward Pakistan by car. Polnareff is behind the wheel on a dangerous mountain road when a mysterious vehicle starts impeding their progress.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Justice Part 1
programme.desc: After surviving another attack, Jotaro and his team make it to Pakistan, where they stop at an inn to rest. The village around the inn, however, is quiet, and its inhabitants rather odd.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The match between Hisoka and Kastro is about to begin.

programme.title: Little Man, (2006, Comedy)
programme.desc: A wannabe dad mistakes a vertically challenged criminal on the lam as his newly adopted son.

programme.title: I'm Gonna Git You Sucka, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: This ultra-hip Comedy in the tradition of The Naked Gun and Airplane stars Keenan Ivory Wayans in an Action Adventure filled with screwball gags and side-splitting one-liners.

programme.title: Blankman, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: In Living Color's favorite team of Damon Wayans and David Alan Grier joins Robin Givens, Jon Polito and Jason Alexander in this hilarious crime-fighting comedy about two slapstick heroes who triumph over evil... more or less. Rated PG-13

programme.title: Little Man, (2006, Comedy)
programme.desc: A wannabe dad mistakes a vertically challenged criminal on the lam as his newly adopted son.

programme.title: American Beauty, (1999, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Lester's life is far from perfect. As he makes a few changes in his life, the freer and the happier he gets. However, Lester is about to learn that the ultimate freedom comes at a price.

programme.title: The Time Machine, (2002, Adventure)
programme.desc: Hoping to alter the events of the past, a 19th-century inventor instead travels 800,000 years into the future, where he finds humankind divided into two warring races.

programme.desc: Tintin and his friends discover directions to a sunken ship commanded by Capt. Haddock's ancestor and go off on a treasure hunt.

programme.title: Battle Royale, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: A group of students from a Japanese high school are forced to compete in a battle, killing one another until only one is left standing.

programme.title: DOA: Dead or Alive, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: The world's best fighters are invited to DOA, a martial-arts tournament. Four female rival fighters, an aristocratic warrior, a wrestling superstar, an athlete with a tragic past, and an assassin-for-hire, work together to uncover a secret.

programme.title: The Lazarus Effect, (2015, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: A group of medical researchers discover a way to bring dead patients back to life.

programme.desc: Based on the novel by Stephen King, CHRISTINE tells the story of a 1957 Plymouth that takes on human characteristics.

programme.title: WarGames, (1983, War Drama)
programme.desc: The fate of mankind rests in the hands of a teenager (Matthew Broderick) who accidentally taps into the Defense Department's tactical computer. Dabney Coleman and Ally Sheedy co-star.

programme.title: Lifeforce, (1985, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: A frightening journey into the unknown awaits an Earthbound scout ship when it comes across an alien spacecraft of enormous proportions. Further investigation reveals a roomful of glass coffins containing the bodies of frozen creatures.

programme.title: Raw Deal, (1986, Action)
programme.desc: Dismissed some time ago from the FBI, Mark Kaminsky is contacted by his old boss, Shannon, whose son has been murdered. Shannon needs Kaminsky's help and offers to re-instate him if he is successful.

programme.title: Runaway Train, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: Jon Voight and Eric Roberts turn in Oscar-nominated performances as a pair of escaped convicts who hop a freight train, but when the engineer dies of a heart attack, they find themselves trapped, alone and speeding toward certain disaster.

programme.title: The Name of the Rose, (1986, Thriller)
programme.desc: In 1327, an enlightened friar and his young apprentice investigate a series of mysterious deaths at an abbey, risking the wrath of a powerful Inquisitor. Television adaptation of Umberto Eco's novel 'The Name of the Rose'.

programme.title: Salmon Fishing In The Yemen, (2012, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A fisheries expert is approached by a consultant to help realize a sheik's vision of bringing the sport of fly-fishing to the desert and embarks on an upstream journey of faith and fish to prove the impossible possible.

programme.title: Minority Report, (2002, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In the future, a division of the police department has the technology to arrest killers before they commit crimes; however, the tables turn on one of the cops working within the division.

programme.title: Super 8, (2011, Adventure)
programme.desc: In the summer of 1979, a group of friends in a small Ohio town witness a catastrophic train crash while making a Super 8 movie and soon suspect that it was not an accident.

programme.title: Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow, (2004, Adventure)
programme.desc: When mysterious giant robots begin attacking the streets of New York City, intrepid reporter Polly Perkins is on the story and enlists the aid of ace aviator and old flame Joseph 'Sky Captain' Sullivan.

programme.title: Kiba, Shino and Hinata have come up with an idea to use the Bikochu beetle to find Sasuke.

programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto, Kiba and Shino are pursued and find themselves cornered in the hive of a queen bee.

programme.title: While training in the Hidden Leaf Village, Naruto rescues three men from the rapids who have come to request a mission.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Kurosuki gang captures Rokusuke, and Raiga tells him that he will hold a funeral for him!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Raiga comes back to life, only to see Ranmaru lying deathly still on the ground.

programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Tsunade orders Naruto, Hinata, Kiba and Akamaru on a mission to capture the thief Gosunkugi.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and the others tend to an injured Sazanami. As Sazanami tells it, he had once been a swordsmith in a peaceful town and was framed for a murder committed by Gosunkugi.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: While Guy and Lee are away, two impostors dressed like them sneak into Hidden Leaf Village.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Land of Birds is in turmoil due to a specter known as the Cursed Warrior, which is believed to be the ghost of Lord Owashi, the previous feudal lord who died suddenly.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Moso, the late feudal lords counselor, and Komei, the chief strategist, are at odds with each other. Neji begins to think that the Cursed Warrior is part of a plot
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Komei is controlling the Cursed Warrior. Moso thwarts Komei's ambitions. The Leaf team feels uneasy about his motives. Neji doesn't want to get involved, but Naruto is defiant. Gamakichi and Gamatatsu are summoned to investigate
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Tenten and Neji have no choice but to listen to Kakashi. He senses that their being followed. Komei has been declared a criminal and is to be executed. The Cursed Warrior appears and snatches Komei away.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Sagi swears to punish Moso himself. Naruto is reminded of Sasuke when he sees Sagi. Neither words nor Naruto's attempts to stop him can deter Sagi from his chosen path of revenge.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: At Moso's mansion, a battle takes place between the Wandering Ninja and a Leaf Ninja. With Chishima's help, Naruto is freed from Moso's genjutsu. Moso then reveals his true form as the leader of the Wandering ninja, Hoki!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Choji and Naruto are craving Ichiraku's special ramen only to find out that they find the shop closed! Teuchi reveals that his daughter has been kidnapped by Ryonin, aka the Ninja Chefs, who is after his secret recipes!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Demon of the Ocean is wreaking havoc in the Land of the Sea. Anko leads a team consisting of Naruto, Ino, and Shino. It turns out Anko has an unexpected history with the Land of the Sea.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Unable to find Naruto, Anko meets with officials from the Land of the Sea. The ship carrying government funds that they were supposed to guard sets sail the next day!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: As soon as she awakens, Anko begins to remember Demon Island, a place once visited with her former sensei, Orochimaru. Anko reveals the truth behind the disappearances and the secret behind Isaribi's body.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Amachi and his gang begin their attack on the government ship. Naruto and the others escape from Demon Island, but the sight that greets them is the Land of the Sea fleet on the verge of annihilation.

programme.title: Kunijiro visits Tsunade and decides to have Naruto guide his boy through one day in the life of a ninja!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: After escaping from the cave, Naruto and the others chase after the Kedouin in order to put a halt to their plot, but the Village Hidden in the Leaves is already under attack.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto discovers Jiraiya is up to no good. Jiraiya claims to be busy getting his manuscript ready before his deadline. Impatient and irritated, Naruto writes his own manuscript for Jiraiya!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Hidden Leaf Village receives a request from the Village Hidden in the Stars to guard a star. The star is actually a meteorite that fell 200 years ago and is said to possess mysterious powers.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and the others investigate the whereabouts of the stolen star. The team suspects that is an inside job because the ninja who took the star used the ninja art, Kujaku, from the Star Village.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Akahoshi, the masked ninja who kidnapped Sumaru, intends to use Sumaru to call out the mysterious ninja who stole the star.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Pain & Gain, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: When an ambitious group of personal trainers go after the American Dream, they get caught up in a criminal enterprise that goes horribly wrong. Now, living large will take everything they've got in this unbelievable and outrageous true story.

programme.title: Get Shorty, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Golden Globe winner John Travolta stars with Gene Hackman, Danny DeVito and Rene Russo in this wildly popular comedy of a gangster who turns into a big-time producer after he travels to Hollywood to collect a debt from a down-and-out filmmaker.

programme.desc: John Travolta is back as Chili Palmer in this sequel to "Be Cool." With an all-star cast that includes Uma Thurman and The Rock, "Be Cool" is the hilarious tale about a gangster-turned-music-mogul...and what it takes to be number one with a bullet!

programme.title: Chinatown, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jake Gittes, a private eye, uncovers a web of personal and political scandals while he is hired by a beautiful socialite to investigate her husband's extra marital affair.

programme.title: A Simple Plan, (1998, Drama)
programme.desc: In a gym bag. That's how three men size up what they've found in the snowy Minnesota woods. They've come across a downed plane with a rotting corpse inside...and over $4 million stuffed inside a duffel bag. Finders, keepers? Maybe.

programme.title: Miami Blues, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: An ex-con (Alec Baldwin) tiptoes on the borderline of psychotic behavior, playing cops and robbers on both sides of the law. He robs and kills one minute and poses as a cop the next in this thriller with a comic edge.

programme.title: Original Gangstas, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: A fast-paced Action-Thriller about adults living in a crime-ridden area. They are tired of being bullied, and take matters into their own hands to rid the town of the criminals.

programme.title: Chinatown, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jake Gittes, a private eye, uncovers a web of personal and political scandals while he is hired by a beautiful socialite to investigate her husband's extra marital affair.

programme.desc: Nora and Mary are spoiled sisters living the good life in Beverly Hills until their loving father unexpectedly dies.

programme.desc: Emma is a mischievous beauty who sets up her single friends, making a hilariously tangled mess of their lives until she herself falls in love. Gwyneth Paltrow stars in this beloved adaptation of Jane Austen's novel.

programme.title: North Dallas Forty, (1979, Comedy)

programme.title: The Gambler, (1974, Thriller)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi can't strike Marik's life points, and with every turn that passes, Marik is one step closer to taking down Yugi with a final strike from The Winged Dragon of Ra...

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With Yugi at the end of his ropes and the maniacal Marik waging all-out war, can Marik's oldest friend reach Marik in time to help him come to his senses before his insanity overwhelms him?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Will the combined force of all of Yugi's monsters be enough to defeat an Egyptian God that terminated two other powerful Egyptian Gods? The fate of the world hangs in the balance with the finale of the Battle City Tournament!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: KaibaCorp Island is set to explode in mere minutes, but the blimp's engines are offline! Can Yugi and friends escape from the island in time, or will they sink to the bottom of the sea?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Ta and Serenity tour around the Town of Domino and reminisce about their friends' battles during Battle City, they learn how much they've grown and far they've come... and how far they have left to go!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The three Egyptian God Cards are stolen! A terrifying new villain emerges! Real monsters begin to appear around the world! Can Yugi and the gang discover how these strange events are connected before the planet is destroyed?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With Seal of Orichalcos, not only can Gurimo have ten monsters at once, but each creature receives a power boost from Orichalcos's malevolent energies! Yugi better find a way to protect himself against Gurimo's horde!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Not only is our world on the brink of apocalypse, but an entire domain of monsters is also on the verge of collapse! Both Earth and the monster domain must unite and fight against the largest terror they have ever faced!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the gang set off on a cross-country trek when they're asked for help from a one-eyed former foe.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba returns to Duelist Kingdom for a showdown against Pegasus! Will Kaiba discover the secret behind Pegasus's strategies before he loses his soul, just like he did on his first trip to Duelist Kingdom?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Not only does Alister's fiend gain attack points for every fiery monster on the field, but it can also take control of Kaiba's monsters! Will Alister get his revenge, or will Kaiba get aid from the monster domain?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai's back to help Yugi take down Dartz and save the world from annihilation... or is a topsy-turvy twist in the works?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai has joined the enemy! Is she brainwashed, or is there some deeper reason for her unexpected transformation?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Taking advantage of the Seal of Orichalcos, Mai coordinates her Harpie Ladies to whittle Joey's forces into waste! Is this the last we'll see of him, or will a legendary guardian recognize Joey as a true duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With the potent powers of Claw of Hermos, Joey transforms Time Wizard into an almighty... hammer? Can Joey master the uncanny abilities of his new card to pound Mai's Harpie Ladies before they slash him to shreds?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Professor Hawkins has discovered startling connections between the world's conundrums, the Orichalcos stones and an ancient lost civilization.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a Wild West showdown between Yugi and his fiercest challenge yet: Rafael and his guardian monsters.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi calls on the legendary strength of Timaeus, but when it's not enough to crack Rafael's defense, will Yugi resort to desperate measures and go against everything he believes in to make the riskiest move of his life?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Using the abilities of Seal of Orichalcos, Yugi grinds Rafael's guardians, but he's also succumbing to the card's evil influence. As darkness grows within his heart, the consequences of his non-heroic acts may be his undoing.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz has captured Yugi's soul! Broken and unmotivated, how will our heroes ever rescue Yugi, especially when Dartz has a duo of nefarious new recruits ready to eradicate them?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: A cross-country expedition turns tragic when Dartz's new duelists separate Yugi from Joey in order to capture their souls separately.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Nothing will stop Weevil and Rex Raptor from quenching their thirst for revenge by capturing Yugi and Joey's souls!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Having lost the trust of Timaeus, Yugi can no longer use his guardian dragon against Weevil's insect invasion. Discouraged and confused, Yugi has lost his dueling instincts.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is on a vision quest where he must travel through a past of evil to find and conquer his greatest foe... himself.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is in no shape to duel... but Dartz doesn't care! Dartz sends out his ancient annihilator Orichalcos Soldier to finish Yugi once and for all.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Valon is ready to take on the world and fight... for the heart of Mai? And the first adversaries standing in his way are Duke and Rebecca!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a duel thirty thousand feet in the air as Alister squares off against Kaiba on top of an airplane.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Alister dispatches his airborne arsenal Air Fortress Ziggurat! How can Kaiba defeat a monster the size of the plane itself?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz has taken over KaibaCorp! Can Kaiba, with Yugi's help, break into his own company which he's protected with the latest in security technology?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With chaos running rampant, Valon separates Joey from his friends for a final showdown with Mai's heart on the line.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Decked out in high-tech body armor and weapons, Valon pummels Joey with punishing punches. Can Joey outthink the computer before it's too late?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: The battle for Block B hits a crescendo as King Elizabello II prepares his devastating King Punch! But as the powerful attack becomes imminent, the Prodence Kingdom faction unravels! All that may be pointless, though.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Deadly Blow! The Astonishing King Punch!

programme.title: As the handover team approaches Green Bit, they are attacked by the fearsome fish that live off the coast of Dressrosa. But that's the least of their problems as they find the bridge to Green Bit has collapsed!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fighting Fish Strike! Across the Deadly Iron Bridge!

programme.title: Zoro tracks the thief who stole his sword - and learns about a danger facing the Straw Hats! Meanwhile, Law, Usopp, and the others arrive at Green Bit only to find it inhabited by strange creatures, and swarming with the Navy soldiers!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: All but done for, Sanji is trapped by Violet and her crew when she suddenly changes her mind and mysteriously turns on her own men! Meanwhile, Robin and Usopp come face to face with the Little People known as the Tontatta Tribe.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Unknown World! The Tontatta Kingdom!

programme.title: Sanji gets in touch with Law in order to share a shocking secret - that could unsettle the Straw Hats' plans in Dressrosa for good! Meanwhile, Luffy's Block C battle begins, but will his Gum-Gum powers give him away?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Stratagem of the Century! Doflamingo Makes His Move!

programme.title: Sanji and Franky try to regroup after Doflamingo's betrayal, hoping that destroying the factory is not yet out of their grasp. Meanwhile Luffy makes a friend in the Colosseum and Usopp ends up thrust into an uncomfortable position!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Shaking Heaven and Earth! Admiral Fujitora's Power!

programme.title: The Sunny is mysteriously deformed by the bizarre powers of Giolla! Can Nami, Chopper, and Brook act in time to save their beloved home? Meanwhile, the battle for Block C continues as Luffy suffers a staggering setback.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Blow of Anger! A Giant vs. Lucy!

programme.title: After knocking down the Giant, Hajrudin, as payback for what he did to Ucy, Luffy has to deal with Ideo, whose punch has the destructive force of a bomb, while the Funk Brothers show off their bizarre fighting technique.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Destruction Cannon Blasts! Lucy in Trouble!

programme.title: Nami, Chopper, and Brooke keep trying to evade Jora and win back the Sunny even though it's been turned into a piece of art! In the Colosseum, Don Chin Jao finally faces Luffy - whose power will prove greater?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Legendary Pirate! Don Chin Jao!

programme.title: Luffy stands along against Don Chinjao, and learns about the old grudge he bears against Garp! Meanwhile, Usopp and Robin get swept up in the Tontatta Kingdom's raid against the royal family, and Franky learns the eerie secret of Dressrosa.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Light and Shadow! Darkness behind Dressrosa!

programme.title: The Tontatta Kingdom gears up for its all-out assault on the Doflamingo Family, as Usopp and Robin are caught up in the war effort! Meanwhile, Franky arrives the headquarters of the toy movement where he finds Zoro, Nami & the others are cornered by Jora.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Making a Sortie! The Legendary Hero Usoland!

programme.title: Don Chin Jao's hatred of Garp and Luffy is finally explained, while his battle against Luffy comes to an end. With tremendous power, one of them is squarely eliminated! But is that really the end of the Colosseum battle?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fierce Battle Coming to the End! Lucy vs. Chin Jao!

programme.title: With the battle with Don Chinjao long behind him, Luffy advances to the final round! Block-D contender Cavendish, however, takes the chance and pounces on Luffy, who is defended by an unlikely ally! The agenda of Colosseum gladiator Rebecca is exposed.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy and the Gladiator of Fate - Rebecca!

programme.title: Rebecca's deep bonds with the one-legged toy soldier are revealed! Her lineage can be traced to the previous ruler of Dressrosa - and her eternal bond with the damaged toy is linked to the violent overthrow of that regime by none other than Doflamingo!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Protect You to the End! Rebecca and the Toy Soldier!

programme.title: As Rebecca enters the ring for the battle for Block D, the crowd shows its contempt for her heritage - only to be scolded by an unlikely supporter. Meanwhile, the other Straw Hats start to reassemble to deal with the attack on the Sunny.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Last - and Bloodiest - Block! Block D Battle Begins!

programme.title: Doflamingo recounts for Law the surprising history of the Don Quixote Family, while Nami and the others battle the insane and powerful artist, Giolla! Her ultimate attack renders them incapacitated, and prompts the betrayal of one of their closest allies!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Decisive Battle! Giolla vs. the Straw Hats!

programme.title: Law is pinned by Fujitora, and Doflamingo has the upper hand! Only the most cunning of tricks could save Law's plan to hand Caesar over to Nami & the others! Meanwhile, the Sunny falls into danger again, & the battle for Block D heats up in the Colosseum.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Beautiful Sword! Cavendish of the White Horse!

programme.title: Law must put himself in harm's way to defend the Sunny and the Straw Hats from Doflamingo's all-out assault! With barely enough time to save the crew, plans change and send the Sunny on a new mission -- but will it be able to get underway?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Big Clash! Sanji vs. Doflamingo!

programme.title: Law & Doflamingo are embroiled in a heated showdown which triggers Momonosuke's memories of Doflamingo's cruelty from the first time they met; meanwhile, after a tearful fanboy conversation Zoro finally gets to see Luffy but all eyes are fixed on Rebecca.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Rebecca's Special Attack! Last-Ditch Sword Dance!

programme.title: Bartolomeo searches the Colosseum for Luffy but stumbles upon the medical center for the losers of the battles in the ring, but is everything at this center as it seems? Meanwhile, Rebecca has to fend off Rolling Logan's vicious bone-crushing grip attack.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Most Violent Fighter! Logan vs. Rebecca!

programme.title: The losers of the Colosseum battle who are being held below the infirmary have a surprising person in their midst! But do they have a clue as to their terrifying fate? Meanwhile, the Tontatta Kingdom's history is made clear.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Big Surprise! The True Identity of the Toy Soldier!

programme.title: Bartolomeo finally finds Luffy and starts to lead him to Zoro, while the toy soldier begins to tell the heart-breaking story of how Doflamingo cheated the Riku dynasty out of their control of Dressrosa!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Horrible Past! The Secret of Dressrosa!

programme.title: As the toy soldier's story continues, the sad fate of King Riku and his army, and his daughter Princess Viola, is revealed as well as how the people of Dressrosa fell into the hands of Doflamingo. And all the toys in the country share a mysterious secret.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Nightmare! The Tragic Night of Dressrosa!

programme.title: Zoro, Kin'emon, and Luffy are reunited again, but little do they know that their reunion is being monitored by a potential threat! Meanwhile, the battle rages on between Doflamingo and Law as these two powerhouses clash.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Showdown Between the Warlords! Law vs. Doflamingo!

programme.title: Zoro and Kin'emon make a mad dash to save Law but Navy Admiral Fujitora stands in their way, bringing his full power against them. The Navy is in hot pursuit as a ship approaches with unexpected visitors from the past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Two Great Rivals Meet Each Other! Straw Hat and Heavenly Demon!

programme.title: After revealing the horrible history of Dressrosa, Toy Soldier now shares their plan to liberate the Tontatta Kingdom and bring down the Doflamingo Family, Operation SOP. Luffy bumps into a heavily-wounded Bellamy and Bartolomeo
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Astonished! The Man Who Inherits Ace's Will!

programme.title: Usopp and Robin make their way via an underground tunnel dug by the tiny people of the Tontatta Tribe - a tunnel so small in fact, that Franky couldn't fit! Instead, Franky makes his way to the Toy House.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Operation SOP Starts! Usoland Charges Forth!

programme.title: As the contenders for the battle of Block D dwindle to only thirty, Rebecca has her hands full with the menacing Suleiman the Beheader! All hope seems lost that she can take him down and move on to the finals!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Burning Passion! Rebecca vs. Suleiman!

programme.title: The battle for Block D comes to a shocking end and the winner that emerges from the cloud of dust stuns the audience even more! Meanwhile, Luffy, Zoro, Kin'emon, and Wicka of the Tontatta Tribe are about to reach the lift to the palace.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The End of the Match?! A Surprising Result of Block D!

programme.title: Viola, aka Violet, once a great princess of the Dressrosa family, shows Luffy & the others a secret entrance into the palace which avoids the use of the heavily-guarded lift. In the palace's Suit Chamber, Navy Admiral Fujitora reveals his plans.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Admiral's Decision! Fujitora vs. Doflamingo!

programme.title: The final round at the Corrida Colosseum finally begins, as Diamante joins the combatants in an all-out struggle to win the Flare-Flare Fruit! As the stakes escalate, can one champion beat the others & snatch the fruit from the Colosseum's newest hazard?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Final Round Starts! Diamante the Hero Shows Up!

programme.title: Luffy and his group continue their ascent towards Doflamingo's inner sanctum, but standing in their way is an executive of the family whose power is so strong moving past him seems impossible! Meanwhile, Cavendish learns the dark secrets of Dressrosa.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Moving Castle! The Top Executive Pica Rises Up!

programme.title: As Operation SOP finally gets underway but as Leo makes the dash to hide the Tatabasco grape in Sugar's fruit basket, Robin calls for an emergency stop to the plan! Meanwhile, Luffy, Violet, and Zoro are stalled by Pica whose sheer size overwhelms them.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Dragon Claw Strikes! Lucy's Intimidating Attack!

programme.title: Mad Max, (1980, Action)
programme.desc: Max and the gang's worlds converge when the gang wants Max as badly as he wants them, especially after they target him for the death of their former leader.

programme.title: The Core, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: Snowpiercer, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: After a failed global-warming experiment, a post-apocalyptic Ice Age has killed off nearly all life on the planet.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Fast Color, (2019, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Hunted by mysterious forces and a local sheriff, a young woman with supernatural abilities flees back to her familyand unearths the depths of the power within her.

programme.title: The Host, (2013, Adventure)
programme.desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over humans' bodies and erasing their minds, Melanie Stryder risks everything to protect the people she cares about most, proving that love can conquer all in a dangerous new world.

programme.title: The Core, (2003, Science fiction)

programme.title: Snowpiercer, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: After a failed global-warming experiment, a post-apocalyptic Ice Age has killed off nearly all life on the planet.

programme.desc: In this epic Western, two shady mercenaries (Gary Cooper, Burt Lancaster) in Mexico during the 1866 revolution are hired to escort a Countess and her gold to the Mexican army in Vera Cruz and find themselves at odds with the armyand each other!

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in the West, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: The epic story of a mysterious stranger with a harmonica who joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

programme.title: A Fistful Of Dynamite, (1972, Drama)
programme.desc: The results are explosive when an Irish terrorist (James Coburn) with a dynamite obsession teams up with a Mexican peasant-turned- revolutionary (Rod Steiger) in this action-packed tale of power and politics. Directed by the legendary Sergio Leone.

programme.title: God Forgives, I Don't, (1967, Drama)
programme.desc: A fast-shooting gunman and an insurance agent track down the murdering robbers of a train hijacking and the stolen money.

programme.title: Boots And Saddles, (1937, Drama)
programme.desc: A British youngster inherits a ranch so burdened with taxes that he struggles to keep the property. Gene Autry befriends the boy, and becomes involved with an Army colonel's daughter and others.

programme.title: Rootin' Tootin' Rhythm, (1937, Drama)
programme.desc: Ranch owner Gene Autry and his pal Frog Millhouse are after cattle rustlers and become mixed up in a comedy of errors when they don the clothes of two dead outlaws, only to learn that the outlaws are really dead sheriffs, dressed in outlaw's clothes!

programme.title: Man from Music Mountain, (1938, Drama)
programme.desc: Singing cowboy Gene Autry and his sidekick Smiley Burnette star in this feature pitting cattle ranchers and real estate speculators. When it appears that there's gold on a ranch; a group of suspicious men begins selling claims in the local community.

programme.title: Adios, Sabata, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Under the brutal rule of garrison leader Col. Skimmel, a group of Mexican revolutionaries hire gunslinger Sabata (Yul Brynner) to rob a transport of gold in order to buy weapons. But the Colonel has other plans...taking the gold for himself.

programme.title: The Kentuckian, (1955, Drama)
programme.desc: Eli Wakefield (Burt Lancaster) and his son are Kentucky adventurers longing for life on the Texas frontier. They learn, however, that their greatest challenge lies not in the uncharted wilderness, but in the people they meet along the way.

programme.title: Win a Date with Tad Hamilton!, (2004, Comedy)
programme.desc: Rosalee, star-struck small-town girl, wins a date with the Hollywood hunk Tad Hamilton. And while it may be Rosalee's dream-come-true, it means complete chaos for her best friend Pete.

programme.title: Pain & Gain, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: When an ambitious group of personal trainers go after the American Dream, they get caught up in a criminal enterprise that goes horribly wrong. Now, living large will take everything they've got in this unbelievable and outrageous true story.

programme.desc: A bodybuilder headed through town to Vegas is thrust into the dangerous plot of a violent crime family when she falls into a steamy romance with her trainer (Kristen Stewart) in this heart-pounding thriller.

programme.desc: Young vacationers, expecting to have a memorable time diving, find themselves in deep trouble with a druglord when they come upon the illicit cargo of a sunken airplane.

Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Jackie Chan, John Cusack, Adrien Brody Diretor: Daniel Lee

programme.title: Caada ao Presidente, (2015)

Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Crowe, Mark, Russell, Walberg Diretor: Allen Hughes

programme.desc: 1970. Em esforo para salvar o casamento, Emma e Henry viajam para um apartamento remoto de alto padro. No entanto, depois de suspeitarem de um intruso noturno, eles decidem fugir e acabam presos e ameaados por uma voz misteriosa dentro do local. Gneros: Entertainment

programme.desc: 1970. Trs jovens mulheres, da Amrica, da Nigria e da ndia, so vtimas do trfico de mulheres, sendo escravizadas para a prtica de prostituio. O lucro pode ser de centenas de bilhes de dlares anualmente, superando o das maiores empresas do mundo. Gneros: Drama

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: When alien invaders lay waste to planet Earth, its up to a select group of survivors to make a last-ditch stand. Fighting superior technology, mankinds best weapon is the will to survive. Starring Will Smith, Bill Pullman, Jeff Goldblum.

programme.title: Aliens
programme.desc: Ripley reawakens from cryogenic sleep a half-century after a narrow escape from her alien foe, only to be sent to a remote colony to help battle an infestation of Xenomorphs. Starring Sigourney Weaver, Carrie Henn, Michael Biehn.

programme.title: BMF
programme.desc: With Meech MIA, Terry manages the business independently to keep the cash flowing and finds himself at odds as he seeks to exert more control over BMF.

programme.title: BMF
programme.desc: Meech and Terry are focused on expanding their business; while Terry looks for a new connection in South Carolina, a new musical artist piques Meechs interest; Detective Bryant continues his pursuit of BMF.

programme.title: Born to Be Blue
programme.desc: In the late 1960s, jazz trumpeter Chet Baker (Ethan Hawke) begins a romance with an actress (Carmen Ejogo) while trying to stage a musical comeback. Starring Ethan Hawke, Carmen Ejogo, Callum Keith Rennie.

programme.title: Maliglutit
programme.desc: In 1913 in the Canadian Arctic, Kuanana returns from hunting to find his wife and daughter kidnapped and sets of to find the men who did it. Starring Benjamin Kunuk, Karen Ivalu, Jonah Qunaq.

programme.title: Fubar 2
programme.desc: Head bangers Terry (David Lawrence) and Dean (Paul J. Spence) are tired of barely scraping by and jump on an opportunity to go north and work on the pipelines during the holidays. Starring Dave Lawrence, Paul Spence, Gordon Skilling.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: FBI Agent Abby Corrigans life is endangered after she is suddenly attacked by an unfamiliar Abnormal during an investigation; Magnus and Wills heated debate over the best way to help Abby threatens to permanently alter their relationship.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: Magnus and Nikola Tesla get stuck in a virtual Sanctuary world at the mercy of the avatar of Adam Worth.

programme.title: Ozzy
programme.desc: A lovable dog must rely on some new friends to help it break out of canine prison and get back home to his owners. Starring Jeff Foxworthy, Rob Schneider, Frankie Quiones.

programme.title: Yogi Bear
programme.desc: Yogi (Dan Aykroyd), Boo Boo (Justin Timberlake), and Ranger Smith (Tom Cavanagh) team up to stop the mayor from closing Jellystone Park and selling it to loggers. Starring Dan Aykroyd, Justin Timberlake, Anna Faris.

programme.title: The Swan Princess and the Secret of the Castle
programme.desc: Princess Odette is once again transformed into a swan as Prince Derek prepares to battle an evil magician. Starring Michelle Nicastro, Douglas Sills, Jake Williamson.

programme.title: Miltons Secret
programme.desc: A man (Donald Sutherland) teaches his 11-year-old grandson (William Ainscough) how to cope with bickering parents and the neighborhood bully. Starring Donald Sutherland, Michelle Rodriguez, Mia Kirshner.

programme.title: Air Bud: World Pup
programme.desc: The golden retriever helps his young owner (Kevin Zegers) and his coed soccer team to shine while outsmarting a wily dogcatcher. Starring Kevin Zegers, Dale Midkiff, Caitlin Wachs.

programme.title: How the West Was Fun
programme.desc: Twin girls (Mary-Kate Olsen, Ashley Olsen) hatch a plan to save an old womans dude ranch from shady developers. Starring Mary-Kate Olsen, Ashley Olsen, Martin Mull.

programme.title: Switching Goals
programme.desc: Soccer-playing twins (Mary-Kate Olsen, Ashley Olsen) decide to help their father (Eric Lutes), a coach seeking a seventh championship title. Starring Mary-Kate Olsen, Ashley Olsen, Eric Lutes.

programme.title: Gnomeo and Juliet
programme.desc: Love-struck garden gnomes (James McAvoy, Emily Blunt) become part of a feud between rival neighbors in Stratford-Upon-Avon, Shakespeares birthplace. Starring James McAvoy, Emily Blunt, Michael Caine.

programme.title: Bewitched
programme.desc: An actual witch (Nicole Kidman) and a neurotic movie star (Will Ferrell) land the lead roles in a television remake of the 1960s sitcom. Starring Nicole Kidman, Will Ferrell, Shirley MacLaine.

programme.title: Bridesmaids
programme.desc: Though broke and lovelorn, a woman (Kristen Wiig) takes on the strange and expensive rituals associated with being her best friends maid of honor. Starring Kristen Wiig, Maya Rudolph, Rose Byrne.

programme.title: BMF
programme.desc: Meech and Terry find new inspiration in a rising RandB singer; together, they plan to launch a new record label; Terry hatches his own plan to regain control in St. Louis.

programme.title: BMF
programme.desc: Meech and Terry continue to focus on Stomping Ground Records - and on their full-court press to sign Purdy; in St. Louis, things are getting tense as their business partner creates more rivals than friends.

programme.title: Poor Boys Game
programme.desc: While preparing for a boxing match, an ex-convict receives support from the man whose son he beat up. Starring Rossif Sutherland, Danny Glover, Greg Bryk.

programme.title: Lie With Me
programme.desc: A young man (Eric Balfour) and woman (Lauren Lee Smith) enjoy sexual compatibility but have trouble communicating and helping each other with problems. Starring Eric Balfour, Lauren Lee Smith, Don Francks.

programme.title: Perfect High
programme.desc: A teens (Bella Thorne) life spirals out of control when she starts abusing painkillers and heroin with her new friends (Israel Broussard, Daniela Bobadilla) from school. Starring Bella Thorne, Israel Broussard, Daniela Bobadilla.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: Kate warns Magnus about some Abnormals plotting a terrorist attack; she and Addison learn that Bigfoot may be a part of the terrorist cell.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: Seeking to outrace the SCIU, Magnus and Will are captured, injured and trapped in a Bolivian cave in; alone, the two friends struggle to survive as they confront who they are and who theyve become.

programme.title: Step Dogs
programme.desc: Meatball, a wise cracking country dog, and Cassie, Hollywoods most pampered pet, meet when their owners get married. The two fight constantly until burglars break into their house and they must team up to protect their home. Starring Dylan Schmid, Brittney Wilson, Eliana Jones.

programme.title: Clara
programme.desc: In a race to find intelligent life in the universe, an astronomer and his freethinking research assistant make an inexplicable discovery that changes how they see the world -- and each other. Starring Patrick J. Adams, Troian Bellisario, Kristen Hager.

programme.title: Matilda
programme.desc: A little girl develops extraordinary mental abilities, despite neglectful parents and a brutal headmistress. Starring Mara Wilson, Danny DeVito, Rhea Perlman.

programme.title: One Day in the Life of Noah Piugattuk
programme.desc: A government agent tries to get an Inuit man and his children to move to settlement housing. Starring Kim Bodnia, Apayata Kotierk, Benjamin Kunuk.

programme.title: Drink Slay Love
programme.desc: A 16-year old vampire discovers she has the ability to withstand sunlight. Sensing an opportunity to round up new victims, her family enrolls her in high school, where her who-cares attitude quickly makes her the coolest girl around. Starring Cierra Ramirez, Angelique Rivera, Gregg Sulkin.

programme.title: Puppy Swap: Love Unleashed
programme.desc: An engaged couple adopts two puppies. When they decide to split up, the puppies hatch a plan to bring the two back together. Starring Sara Fletcher, Rib Hillis, Corin Nemec.

programme.title: Moonstruck
programme.desc: An Italian-American widow (Cher), engaged to a reticent suitor, falls in love with his brother (Nicolas Cage). Starring Cher, Nicolas Cage, Vincent Gardenia.

programme.desc: A cursed VHS tape unleashes classic cinematic villains into the real world. Starring Kevin Martin, Yaayaa Adams, Matthew Kennedy.

programme.title: Snow Angel
programme.desc: After a fatal accident in a snowy village at the eastern tip of Quebec, a screwed-up ex-pro snowboarder decides to pack up her cabin and leave town for good, but someone -- or something -- seems intent on stopping her. Starring Kimberly-Sue Murray, Olivier Renaud, Catherine Berube.

programme.title: Mom vs. Matchmaker
programme.desc: Adventurous Vanessa and her mom are two peas in a pod that the matchmaker needs to split.

programme.title: One Way Mirror
programme.desc: James Lally admits that he has killed his partner Suzanne LaPierre; it takes more than confession for police to locate her body, leading authorities to a long interrogation with a character who seems more concerned with his own comfort.

programme.title: One Way Mirror
programme.desc: A messy divorce leads to a woman hiding a large sum of money with one of her close friends; when the woman goes missing, her friend, Ashley, is believed to be involved in more than just attempted fraud.

programme.title: One Way Mirror
programme.desc: After police discovers Melinda Pleskovic dead in her home just days before her daughters wedding, police turn to her future son-in-law when his story doesnt seem to add up; he has news of his own, break-ins at the Pleskovic home reveal the culprit.

programme.title: How Not to Hire a Hitman
programme.desc: New couple Leon and Valerie have one unfortunate thing in common, they both hate their exes. When Leons ex-wife and Valeries ex-husband are targeted for murder, it becomes a case of he said/she said. Who hired a hitman?

programme.title: Finally Caught
programme.desc: When a young FBI employee is found strangled to death in her own home, all signs point to her abusive ex -- until her diligent co-workers piece together the clues over several years to reveal that the killer is someone very unexpected.

programme.title: Million Dollar Lethal Listing
programme.desc: After buying the perfect suburban home, a couple encounter a stranger who claims to be the real owner of the house. They soon find themselves in a living nightmare as they try to unravel the secrets and lies. Starring Morgan Bradley, Jon Briddell, Ciarra Carter.

programme.title: Dream Horse
programme.desc: The true story of Dream Alliance, an unlikely racehorse bred by bartender Jan Vokes. With very little money and no experience, Jan convinces her neighbors to chip in their meager earnings to help raise Dream and compete with the racing elites. Starring Toni Collette, Damian Lewis, Owen Teale.

programme.title: The Great British Heist
programme.desc: Three bank robbers take refuge in a local club as the police close in. While the long arm of the law surrounding them outside their sanctuary inside the club is threatened as they start to wonder, are their hostages all that they seem to be? Starring David Brook, Kane Cantell, Richard Harding.

programme.desc: A writer befriends a retired serial killer in a desperate attempt to find inspiration for his next novel and save his marriage. Covering as his marriage counselor, the killer teaches him his methods as reality becomes deadlier than fiction. Starring Steve Buscemi, John Magaro, Britt Lower.

programme.title: Some Other Woman
programme.desc: Eve sees a strange woman watching her and her husband from outside their home. As the stranger slowly intrudes further into their lives, Eve begins to question if shes losing her mind or her husbands loyalty. Starring Tom Felton, Amanda Crew, Ashley Greene.

programme.desc: Tall, dark and handsome Mikail is a stick master in hockey, but his love life is ice-cold; his mother is completely confident she can shoot and score a flame for her son.

programme.desc: Delving into the legacy of filmmakers and uncovers the mystery of why women, especially from underrepresented communities - like Zora Neale Hurston and Esther Eng were - have been erased through historical amnesia.

programme.desc: Four years after a mother is found murdered on a deserted road, investigators link evidence to an air force base where a standardized testing scheme helps connect the murderer to the crime.
